description: The requirement is for translation and editing services from English to French and French to English on an as required basis. The work will be carried out at the contractor's premises and delivered to Statistics Canada.  ...
full_summary:
Title: Translation Services
Tender Reference Number: PW-22-01015331
Publication Date: November 30, 2022
Closing Date: January 13, 2023

Statistics Canada is seeking translation services for various projects within the agency. The services required include the translation of English text into French and French text into English, on an as-needed basis. The work must be performed at the contractor's premises and delivered to Statistics Canada.

The scope of the work includes the translation of text in various fields, such as statistical surveys, descriptive statistics, agriculture, economics, justice, health, environmental science, geography and geomatics, social science, transportation, and more. The contractor must be able to provide translation services of large volumes, up to 10,500,000 words per year for the English to French translation and up to 1,000,000 words per year for the French to English translation.

The anticipated contract period will be from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025, with the possibility of three additional one-year option periods. The contractor must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the contract security requirements, which include obtaining a Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and providing trained contractors.

The translation services required are for the following classes:

* Class A: Translation from English to French, estimated annual requirement of 10,500,000 words
* Class B: Translation from French to English, estimated annual requirement of 1,000,000 words

The contract security requirements are outlined in the tender package and must be complied with. The Security Classification for Canadian Suppliers is PWGSC File No. J063414.

For more information about the tender and the security requirements, please refer to the attachment or contact:

Abbas Khokhar
Email: abbas.khokhar@statcan.gc.ca
Phone: 343-548-1422

Enquires can be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least five days before the closing date.

To be considered for this tender, interested parties must submit their bid to Statistics Canada by the closing date and time indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation. Missing this deadline may result in the bid not being considered. 

Note: Please do not hesitate to contact me if the input is unclear. I'll be here to assist you in case. 

Please also render this text in Markdown format.
